hero.name: Hero Section
hero.description: The first thing visitors see - must capture attention and communicate value
hero.promptTemplate:
Create a hero section with:
- A compelling headline that communicates the main benefit: '{{headline}}'
- A subheadline that expands on the value: '{{subheadline}}'
- Primary CTA button: '{{cta}}'
- {{heroVisual}}
- Use {{style}} visual style with {{animationLevel}} animations
- Ensure the CTA stands out with contrasting color
- Add subtle social proof if applicable (e.g., '10,000+ users' badge)

animations.subtle: Fade in on load, hover effects on CTA
animations.moderate: Staggered text reveal, smooth CTA hover
animations.rich: AnimatedGradientText for headline, TypingAnimation for subheadline, floating elements

logos.name: Social Proof Logos
logos.description: Build trust by showing recognizable brands
logos.promptTemplate:
Create a 'Trusted by' section with:
- A subtle heading like 'Trusted by leading companies' or 'Used by teams at'
- A row of 5-8 grayscale company logos
- Logos should be evenly spaced and responsive
- On mobile, show 4 logos in a row or use a subtle marquee
- Keep it understated - this section supports, not dominates

features.name: Features Section
features.description: Highlight key benefits with icons and brief descriptions
features.promptTemplate:
Create a features section with:
- Section headline: '{{sectionTitle}}'
- {{featureCount}} feature cards in a responsive grid
- Each card has: icon, title, description (2-3 sentences max)
- Features to highlight: {{features}}
- Use {{style}} visual style
- Focus on BENEFITS, not just features
- Icons should be from lucide-react

animations.moderate: Staggered card reveal with viewport trigger

how-it-works.name: How It Works
how-it-works.description: Simple step-by-step explanation of the process
how-it-works.promptTemplate:
Create a 'How It Works' section with:
- Section headline
- 3 numbered steps with icons and descriptions
- Steps: {{steps}}
- Visual connection between steps (line, arrow, or flow)
- Each step should be concise - one sentence
- Optional: small illustration or screenshot per step

testimonials.name: Testimonials
testimonials.promptTemplate:
Create a testimonials section with:
- Section headline: 'What our customers say' or similar
- {{testimonialCount}} testimonial cards
- Each testimonial has: quote, author name, role, company, optional photo
- Testimonials: {{testimonials}}
- Include star rating if applicable
- Layout: {{testimonialLayout}}

pricing.name: Pricing Section
pricing.description: Clear pricing tiers with feature comparison
pricing.promptTemplate:
Create a pricing section with:
- Section headline
- {{planCount}} pricing tiers
- Plans: {{plans}}
- Highlight the recommended/popular plan with a badge and border
- Each plan shows: name, price, billing period, features list, CTA
- Include a toggle for monthly/annual if applicable
- Make the CTA different for each tier (e.g., 'Start Free' vs 'Contact Sales')

faq.name: FAQ Section
faq.promptTemplate:
Create an FAQ section with:
- Section headline: 'Frequently Asked Questions'
- {{faqCount}} questions in an accordion format
- Questions: {{faqs}}
- Use shadcn/ui Accordion component
- Include a 'Still have questions? Contact us' link at the bottom

cta-final.name: Final CTA Section
cta-final.description: Last chance to convert - reinforce value
cta-final.promptTemplate:
Create a final CTA section with:
- Compelling headline that reinforces the main benefit
- Brief supporting text (1-2 sentences)
- Primary CTA button: '{{cta}}'
- Optional: secondary CTA or contact link
- Background should contrast with other sections
- Add urgency element if appropriate

stats.name: Statistics Section
stats.promptTemplate:
Create a stats section with:
- 3-4 impressive statistics
- Stats: {{stats}}
- Large numbers with labels below
- Responsive grid layout
- Consider number counter animation

form.name: Lead Capture Form
form.promptTemplate:
Create a lead capture form with:
- Headline explaining what they get
- Form fields: {{formFields}}
- Submit button: '{{submitText}}'
- Privacy note below form
- Form should be simple - fewer fields = higher conversion
- Consider inline validation

animations.rich: Field reveal animation, confetti on success
